data.title: NATO-alphabet's odd uncles
data.statement:
The NATO alphabet is the standard now for using a word to indicate the letter that word starts with: 
"Lima Echo Oscar" for "Leo" (for example)

But did you know that there have been multiple other attempts at this ?
(Just for fun, you can read more about that fascinating history/story at the MentalFloss link far below.)

Following are 4 of those alphabet-attempts along with the year each started.

Your task is to:
~ upgrade the input to the <<next>> version, or
~ if it's already in the <<newest>> version: <<degrade>> it to the <<oldest>> version

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 

<<Year-1908:>> Authority, Bills, Capture, Destroy, Englishmen, Fractious, Galloping, High, Invariably, Juggling, Knights, Loose, Managing, Never, Owners, Play, Queen, Remarks, Support, The, Unless, Vindictive, When, Xpeditiously, Your, Zigzag

<<Year-1917:>> Apples, Butter, Charlie, Duff, Edward, Freddy, George, Harry, Ink, Johnnie, King, London, Monkey, Nuts, Orange, Pudding, Queenie, Robert, Sugar, Tommy, Uncle, Vinegar, Willie, Xerxes, Yellow, Zebra

<<Year-1927:>> Amsterdam, Baltimore, Casablanca, Denmark, Edison, Florida, Gallipoli, Havana, Italia, Jerusalem, Kilogramme, Liverpool, Madagascar, New-York, Oslo, Paris, Quebec, Roma, Santiago, Tripoli, Uppsala, Valencia, Washington, Xanthippe, Yokohama, Zurich

<<Year-1956:>> Alfa, Bravo, Charlie, Delta, Echo, Foxtrot, Golf, Hotel, India, Juliett, Kilo, Lima, Mike, November, Oscar, Papa, Quebec, Romeo, Sierra, Tango, Uniform, Victor, Whiskey, X-ray, Yankee, Zulu


~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 


Sources:
https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/504886/4-phonetic-alphabets-didnt-survive
https://owenspencer-thomas.com/journalism/media-tips/spelling-out-words/

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn: Vindictive Authority Loose Invariably Destroy Authority The Owners Remarks
testCases.testOut: Vinegar Apples London Ink Duff Apples Tommy Orange Robert

testCases.title: Let's Regress - Test 4
testCases.testIn: Romeo Echo Golf Romeo Echo Sierra Sierra
testCases.testOut: Remarks Englishmen Galloping Remarks Englishmen Support Support

testCases.title: Rest are random - Test 5
testCases.testIn: Tripoli Havana Edison Quebec Uppsala Italia Casablanca Kilogramme
testCases.testOut: Tango Hotel Echo Quebec Uniform India Charlie Kilo

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: Juggling Unless Managing Play Support Owners Vindictive Englishmen Remarks
testCases.testOut: Johnnie Uncle Monkey Pudding Sugar Orange Vinegar Edward Robert

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: Bravo Romeo Oscar Whiskey November Foxtrot Oscar X-ray
testCases.testOut: Bills Remarks Owners When Never Fractious Owners Xpeditiously

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: Jerusalem Uppsala Madagascar Paris Santiago Oslo Valencia Edison Roma
testCases.testOut: Juliett Uniform Mike Papa Sierra Oscar Victor Echo Romeo

testCases.title: Test 7
testCases.testIn: Lima Alfa Zulu Yankee Delta Oscar Golf
testCases.testOut: Loose Authority Zigzag Your Destroy Owners Galloping

testCases.title: Validator 7
testCases.testIn: Liverpool Amsterdam Zurich Yokohama Denmark Oslo Gallipoli
testCases.testOut: Lima Alfa Zulu Yankee Delta Oscar Golf

testCases.title: Test 8
testCases.testIn: Tommy Harry Edward Queenie Uncle Ink Charlie King
testCases.testOut: Tripoli Havana Edison Quebec Uppsala Italia Casablanca Kilogramme

testCases.title: Validator 8
testCases.testIn: Bills Remarks Owners When Never Fractious Owners Xpeditiously
testCases.testOut: Butter Robert Orange Willie Nuts Freddy Orange Xerxes

testCases.title: Test 9
testCases.testIn: Tango Hotel Echo Quebec Uniform India Charlie Kilo
testCases.testOut: The High Englishmen Queen Unless Invariably Capture Knights

testCases.title: Validator 9
testCases.testIn: Butter Robert Orange Willie Nuts Freddy Orange Xerxes
testCases.testOut: Baltimore Roma Oslo Washington New-York Florida Oslo Xanthippe

testCases.title: Is it This Quebec or ... ?? - Test 12
Validator 13
testCases.testIn: Quebec Quebec Quebec Quebec Quebec Sierra
testCases.testOut: Queen Queen Queen Queen Queen Support

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A word spelled out using an alphabet
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> That same word spelled out with a different alphabet

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The NATO alphabet is the standard now for using a word to indicate the letter that word starts with:
"Lima Echo Oscar" for "Leo" (for example)

But did you know that there have been multiple other attempts at this ?
(Just for fun, you can read more about that fascinating history/story at the MentalFloss link far below.)

Following are 4 of those alphabet-attempts along with the year each started.

Your task is to:
~ upgrade the input to the next version, or
~ if it's already in the newest version: degrade it to the oldest version

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

Year-1908: Authority, Bills, Capture, Destroy, Englishmen, Fractious, Galloping, High, Invariably, Juggling, Knights, Loose, Managing, Never, Owners, Play, Queen, Remarks, Support, The, Unless, Vindictive, When, Xpeditiously, Your, Zigzag

Year-1917: Apples, Butter, Charlie, Duff, Edward, Freddy, George, Harry, Ink, Johnnie, King, London, Monkey, Nuts, Orange, Pudding, Queenie, Robert, Sugar, Tommy, Uncle, Vinegar, Willie, Xerxes, Yellow, Zebra

Year-1927: Amsterdam, Baltimore, Casablanca, Denmark, Edison, Florida, Gallipoli, Havana, Italia, Jerusalem, Kilogramme, Liverpool, Madagascar, New-York, Oslo, Paris, Quebec, Roma, Santiago, Tripoli, Uppsala, Valencia, Washington, Xanthippe, Yokohama, Zurich

Year-1956: Alfa, Bravo, Charlie, Delta, Echo, Foxtrot, Golf, Hotel, India, Juliett, Kilo, Lima, Mike, November, Oscar, Papa, Quebec, Romeo, Sierra, Tango, Uniform, Victor, Whiskey, X-ray, Yankee, Zulu

Input

Output
Line 1: That same word spelled out with a different alphabet
Constraints
Example
Input
Authority Bills Capture
Output
Apples Butter Charlie
